top.title: Ukrainians raise flag to show BBC the fight goes on in city claimed by Russia
top.summary: Ukraine barely has a hold on Pokrovsk, but its forces are keen to show they are still resisting Russia's advance.

top.title: Ukraine prepares new peace plan as Zelensky rules out giving up land
top.summary: Kyiv is seeking to resist a US push for a deal which would see territory handed over to Russia.

top.title: Congress ups pressure to release boat strike video with threat to Hegseth's travel budget
top.summary: US lawmakers could withhold Pentagon travel funds until unedited video of a controversial incident is made public.

top.title: EU investigates Google over AI-generated summaries in search results
top.summary: It is examining whether the tech giant did not offer "appropriate compensation" to web publishers.

top.title: Trump gives Nvidia green light to sell advanced AI chips to China
top.summary: Nvidia had been at the centre of a geopolitical tug-of-war between the US and China in recent months.

top.title: Elon Musk's X bans European Commission from making ads after €120m fine
top.summary: The EU regulator had fined the social media platform over its "deceptive" blue tick badges.

title.#text: The war on disinformation is a losing battle
Trump says Nvidia can sell more powerful AI chips to China
